short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline your Amazon reimbursement process with the Clove extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline your Amazon reimbursement process with the Clove extension.

Once you have signed up for our reimbursement tool, use the Clove extension to:

UTILIZE PRE-MADE CASE TEMPLATES: Access a variety of templates to swiftly open cases within seconds
AUTOMATE DOCUMENT GENERATION: Create and download necessary case documentation directly from our extension, eliminating the need to spend time on creating, searching, or uploading documents yourself
COPY-PASTE EASE: Easily copy case information from our extension directly into Amazon, streamlining your process
TRACK CASE UPDATES: Use our unique CC email feature to stay updated on case progress
MANAGE YOUR CASES: Add notes to stay on top of your cases, and remove potential cases that are no longer relevant, keeping your dashboard clean and organized
